loggerCommandStartedString: Execution of the command %s has been started.
loggerCommandCompletedString: Execution of the command %s has been finished. Exit code %s (%s).
commandExecutionErrorResult: Error during execution of the command: %s.
commandUnresolvableWarningResult: Execution of the command was ABORTED due to an unresolvable warning: %s.
commandAbortedByUserErrorResult: Execution of the command was ABORTED by the user.
commandUnexpectedErrorResult: Execution of the command was ABORTED due to unexpected error: %s.
apiOperationProgress: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} API operation progress: %s records completed, %s records failed.
apiOperationError: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} API operation FAILED: %s records completed, %s records failed.
apiOperationError2: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} Batch# %s was INCOMPLETE having %s failed records.
apiOperationError3: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} Job# %s was INCOMPLETE having %s failed records.
jobStopped: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} The job has been successfully completed.
batchDataUploading: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} Batch data uploading... This may take a while.
batchDataProcessing: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} Data upload has been completed. Batch data processing...
jobResultsRetrieving: [Job# %s:%s] {%s} Batch data processing has been completed. Retrieving results... This may take a while.
